short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the days since a given date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visible Motivation: Displays days since a chosen date in the Chrome toolbar for constant motivation.
Habit Tracking: A tool for breaking bad habits and creating positive ones.
Progress Awareness: Easy tracking of personal progress and achievements.
User-Friendly: Simple interface with a logo click to modify the tracked date.
Cross-Device Sync: Synchronies data between Chrome browsers on different devices.
Motivational Reminder: Acts as a visual reminder, encouraging commitment to goals.
